name: INSULTED
description:
--Introduction--

INSULTED is a Yume Nikki fangame by zero0ne0nexus, gummy, and a large part of its conception and some graphics were also contributed by Frankie1205. Play as Cathy and explore two different dream worlds, accessed through the Computer and the Bed. Collect "Objects" that will help her find even more useful Objects. Avoid the stalker of Cathy's dreams that appears in both worlds to hunt her down. This game is a fangame of Yume Nikki and has no direct correlation with Yume Nikki or its creator, KIKIYAMA.

--Warnings--

This game contains: loud noises, sudden surprises, chase scenes, flashing lights, bright colors, violence, references to weirdcore/liminal space imagery, and mild suggestive themes. If you are sensitive to any of these content descriptors, it is not recommended to play this game.
